title: ###IMPORTANT SCRIPTER Report#####Name Removed#####
body:
I would like to report Scripter. He is using script and duo with his friends.
He is breaking game rules.
I save his video op.gg and my profile when I was playing with him.

his account is
_Name Removed_
please block and suits him or he is gonner do again and again.
thanks.

replies.body: I met him again today maybe this server  don't care about using Scripter.

Hey CCG Corpse,

This isn't the place to report people. You should be using the end game report system for that, or if you forget to use the end game report system you should send in a ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

yap. I already reported after games. but they are still playing.
anyway thanks for the link.

Yeah, it can take a little while for scripters to get banned because they get banned in waves (like [this one](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AEVP3NMA-anti-cheater-banwave-incoming) ⁣). I hope you don't have to play with that scripter again though :(
